relation: There are these blue safety poles everywhere on campus in case you're walking alone, where you can call campus police. They give you campus polices' telephone number in every dorm in case of an emergency.

Greek life is very alive at Winthrop University! You'll see them every week around common time. They have fundraisers and fun events around campus, especially during the Fall. And don't forget the cool parties they throw!

There are so many clubs and activities to join it's ridiculous! Anything you could possibly think of, there's a club for it. Which is a great thing because students can get involved around campus doing something they enjoy.

For fun, you can attend greek life parties, go to city in Charlotte, which is only 30 minutes away, and shop, party, go to concerts, anything! You can also join any of the cool clubs that Winthrop University has.

The Thomson cafe is okay. There are certain days where they will have great food and certain days where its barely anything in there you'll like. The Diggs Center is pretty cool too, the food is awesome but very pricey. However, I wish they had more variety.

The dorm rooms are pretty old and need to be updated. You would think as much as tuition is there, they would be a little nicer. However, with all the fun you will have, the quality of the dorm rooms will no longer be a problem to you.
With the professors, small class sizes, and a wide variety of tutoring opportunities, your academic goals can be reached in no time! The Professors are really nice and take education seriously.
Get to know the people around you. Be open to new students that you may have never thought you would ever speak to. You will be amazed at the lasting friendships you will make.

If you are looking for a diverse University, then Winthop University is for you! The campus is filled with friendly and helpful people everywhere. Winthrop University is the best place to receive a well-rounded degree.
pageTitle: Winthrop University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here I have never had better relationships with teachers as I have had in my first two semesters here. Am learning a lot I never thought I'd learn so much pursuing a Computer Science degree from a liberal arts college. The classes are small so you receive individual attention from teachers who really care, and are more than willing to meet with you after class to help you with anything.
